author: Jennifer Ouellette
title: Counterpoint: MIT scientists translate coronavirus protein structure into music
description: "It tricks our ear in the same way the virus tricks our cells."
content:
Enlarge/ A visualization of the vibrational properties of the spike protein of the novel coronavirus (SARS-Cov-2). Primary colors represent the spikes three protein chains.
4 with 4 posters participating
